title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' issue can be observed in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui. When performing the following steps: 1. Create a new project named xxx. 2. Open the Package viewer in project A. 3. Select a package from the viewer. 4. Right-click on the selected package and choose the 'Copy' option from the context menu. The expected behavior is that the package is copied to the specified destination. However, the actual behavior is currently unobserved.
OB: When performing the steps mentioned in the description, no specific observed behavior has been mentioned.
EB: When copying a package in the Package viewer, the selected package should be successfully duplicated or moved to the specified destination.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project named xxx. 2. Open the Package viewer in project A. 3. Select a package from the viewer. 4. Right-click on the selected package and choose the 'Copy' option from the context menu.
